Sustainability Oversight
A strong governance structure supports our 
focus on sustainability. The Nominating and 
Corporate Governance Committee of Altra’s 
Board of Directors oversees our sustainability 
strategy. The Committee regularly reviews the 
overall corporate govenance of the Company, 
including Altra’s posture and activities 
regarding ESG matters and recommends 
improvements when necessary.
ESG Data Collection and Reporting
A critical part of the evolution of sustainability 
at Altra is the reporting of our ESG performance 
in a consistent, transparent, and accessible 
manner for our stakeholders. We have invested 
in resources to enhance our global systems to 
improve our ability to efficiently collect and 
assess data that is important to understanding 
our impact. We intend to continue our efforts to 
better understand the best standards that will 
provide a foundation for collecting, assessing, 
and validating data across the organization and  
for meaningful data analysis.OUR SUSTAINABILITY PILLARS
Altra’s objective is to implement 
processes that maximize progress and 
growth to create a more sustainable 
path forward.
As we developed our sustainability strategy, we 
focused our efforts on exploring, refining and 
understanding areas where we have an impact 
and identifying opportunities for improvement. 
The results of our Materiality Assessment 
validated that Altra’s sustainability impact has 
been and will continue to be rooted in our  
Core Values and bolstered by ABS. With this 
in mind, we created four Sustainability Pillars 
which align our material ESG topics to our  
Core Values. These pillars highlight where we 
are focused on driving continuous improvement 
for the betterment of all our stakeholders. Delivering solutions
